00081 //----------------------------------------------------------
00082 URef< GrTextureBase	>
00083 GrTextureMgr::GetTextureFile( const UPath& imageName, GrTextureBase::EFORMAT format, GrTextureBase::Flags flags, bool cacheImage, bool cache )
00084 {
00086         URef< GrTextureBase > texture;
00087         if ( cache )
00088         {
00089                 if ( format == GrTextureBase::EF_GUESS )
00090                         texture = FindTexture( imageName );
00091                 else
00092                         texture = FindTexture( imageName, format, flags );
00093 
00094                 if ( texture != 0 )
00095                         return texture;
00096         }
00097 
00099         if ( !gRFileMgr->Exists( imageName ) )
00100                 return 0;
00101 
00103         texture = new GrTexture( imageName, imageName, format, flags, cacheImage );
00104         _textureVec.push_back( texture );
00105         if ( cache )
00106                 InsertTexture( texture );
00107 
00109         return texture;
00110 }

00112 //----------------------------------------------------------
00113 URef< GrTextureBase	>
00114 GrTextureMgr::GetTextureImage( GrImage* image, GrTextureBase::EFORMAT format, GrTextureBase::Flags flags, bool cache )
00115 {
00116         const UPath& imageName = image->GetName();
00117 
00119         B_ASSERT( image != 0 );
00120         URef< GrTextureBase > texture;
00121         if ( cache )
00122         {
00123                 texture = FindTexture( imageName, format, flags );
00124                 if ( texture != 0 )
00125                 {
00126                         delete image;
00127                         return texture;
00128                 }
00129         }
00130 
00132         texture = new GrTexture( imageName, image, format, flags );
00133         _textureVec.push_back( texture );
00134         if ( cache )
00135                 InsertTexture( texture );
00136 
00138         return texture;
00139 }

00166 URef< GrTextureBase	>
00167 GrTextureMgr::GetTextureCubeFiles( const UPath** imageNames, GrTextureBase::EFORMAT format,
00168                                                                    GrTextureBase::Flags flags, bool cacheImages, bool cache )
00169 {
00170         tstring imageNameStr = imageNames[ 0 ]->GetPathString();
00171         imageNameStr += imageNames[ 1 ]->GetPathString();
00172         imageNameStr += imageNames[ 2 ]->GetPathString();
00173         imageNameStr += imageNames[ 3 ]->GetPathString();
00174         imageNameStr += imageNames[ 4 ]->GetPathString();
00175         imageNameStr += imageNames[ 5 ]->GetPathString();
00176         UPath imageName( imageNameStr );
00177 
00179         URef< GrTextureBase > texture;
00180         if ( cache )
00181         {
00182                 texture = FindTexture( imageName, format, flags );
00183                 if ( texture != 0 )
00184                         return texture;
00185         }
00186 
00188         texture = new GrTextureCube( imageName, imageNames, format, flags, cacheImages );
00189         _textureVec.push_back( texture );
00190         if ( cache )
00191                 InsertTexture( texture );
00192 
00194         return texture;
00195 }

00198 URef< GrTextureBase	>
00199 GrTextureMgr::GetTextureCubeImages( GrImage** images, unsigned int width, GrTextureBase::EFORMAT format,
00200                                                                     GrTextureBase::Flags flags, bool cache )
00201 {
00202         UPath imageName = images[ 0 ]->GetName();
00203         imageName += images[ 1 ]->GetName();
00204         imageName += images[ 2 ]->GetName();
00205         imageName += images[ 3 ]->GetName();
00206         imageName += images[ 4 ]->GetName();
00207         imageName += images[ 5 ]->GetName();
00208 
00210         URef< GrTextureBase > texture;
00211         if ( cache )
00212         {
00213                 texture = FindTexture( imageName, format, flags );
00214                 if ( texture != 0 )
00215                 {
00216                         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 6; ++i )
00217                                 delete[] images[ i ];
00218                         return texture;
00219                 }
00220         }
00221 
00223         texture = new GrTextureCube( imageName, images, format, flags );
00224         _textureVec.push_back( texture );
00225         if ( cache )
00226                 InsertTexture( texture );
00227 
00229         return texture;
00230 }

00256 //----------------------------------------------------------
00257 URef< GrTextureBase	>
00258 GrTextureMgr::FindTexture( const UPath& imageName, GrTextureBase::EFORMAT format, GrTextureBase::Flags flags ) const
00259 {
00261         TextureMap::const_iterator iter = _textures.find( imageName );
00262         while ( iter != _textures.end() && iter->first == imageName )
00263         {
00264                 if ( iter->second->GetFormat() == format && iter->second->GetFlags() == flags )
00265                         return iter->second;
00266 
00267                 ++iter;
00268         }
00269         return 0;
00270 }
00271 
00272 //----------------------------------------------------------
00273 URef< GrTextureBase	>
00274 GrTextureMgr::FindTexture( const UPath& imageName ) const
00275 {
00277         TextureMap::const_iterator iter = _textures.find( imageName );
00278         if ( iter != _textures.end() )
00279         {
00280                 return iter->second;
00281         }
00282         return 0;
00283 }

00285 //----------------------------------------------------------
00286 void
00287 GrTextureMgr::PreContextReset()
00288 {
00290         TextureVec::iterator iter = _textureVec.begin();
00291         while( iter != _textureVec.end() )
00292         {
00294                 if ( ( *iter )->GetRef() == 1 && ( *iter )->GetUnloadable() )
00295                 {
00296                         iter = _textureVec.erase( iter );
00297                         continue;
00298                 }
00299 
00301                 ( *iter )->PreContextReset();
00302                 ++iter;
00303         }
00304 }
00305 
00306 //----------------------------------------------------------
00307 void
00308 GrTextureMgr::PostContextReset()
00309 {
00311         TextureVec::iterator iter = _textureVec.begin();
00312         const TextureVec::iterator end = _textureVec.end();
00313         for ( ; iter != end; ++iter )
00314         {
00316                 ( *iter )->PostContextReset();
00317         }
00318 }

00328 {
00330         GrImage* black = new GrImage( GR_SYSTEX_BLACK, 0x00000000 );
00331         AddAndInsertTexture( new GrTexture( GR_SYSTEX_BLACK, black, GrTexture::EF_RGBA32, GrTexture::kNoMipMap | GrTexture::kNoCompress ) );
00332 
00334         GrImage* white = new GrImage( GR_SYSTEX_WHITE, 0xFFFFFFFF );
00335         AddAndInsertTexture( new GrTexture( GR_SYSTEX_WHITE, white, GrTexture::EF_RGBA32, GrTexture::kNoMipMap | GrTexture::kNoCompress ) );
00336 
00338         GrImage* gray = new GrImage( GR_SYSTEX_GRAY, 0xFF7F7F7F );
00339         AddAndInsertTexture( new GrTexture( GR_SYSTEX_GRAY, gray, GrTexture::EF_RGBA32, GrTexture::kNoMipMap | GrTexture::kNoCompress ) );
00340 
00342         char* data = new char[ 2 ];
00343         data[ 0 ] = 0;
00344         data[ 1 ] = 1;
00345         GrImage* blackWhite = new GrImage( GR_SYSTEX_BLACKWHITE, GrImage::EF_I8, 2, 1, data );
00346         AddAndInsertTexture( new GrTexture( GR_SYSTEX_BLACKWHITE, blackWhite, GrTexture::EF_L8, GrTexture::kNoMipMap | GrTexture::kNoCompress ) );
00347         delete[] data;
00348 
00350         GrImage* error = new GrImage( GR_SYSTEX_ERROR, 0xFF0000FF );
00351         AddAndInsertTexture( new GrTexture( GR_SYSTEX_ERROR, error, GrTexture::EF_RGBA32, GrTexture::kNoMipMap | GrTexture::kNoCompress ) );
00352 
00354         float* depthData = new float[ 1 ];
00355         depthData[ 0 ] = 1.0f;
00356         GrImage* depth = new GrImage( GR_SYSTEX_DEPTH, GrImage::EF_DEPTH, 1, 1, depthData );
00357         AddAndInsertTexture( new GrTexture( GR_SYSTEX_DEPTH, depth, GrTexture::EF_DEPTH, GrTexture::kNoMipMap | GrTexture::kNoCompress ) );
00358         delete[] depthData;
00359 
00361         GrImage* normal = new GrImage( GR_SYSTEX_NORMAL, 0x7F7F7FFF );
00362         AddAndInsertTexture( new GrTexture( GR_SYSTEX_NORMAL, normal, GrTexture::EF_RGBA32, GrTexture::kNoMipMap | GrTexture::kNoCompress ) );
00363 
00365         data = new char[ 256 ];
00366         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 256; ++i )
00367                 data[ i ] = 255-i;
00368         GrImage* linear = new GrImage( GR_SYSTEX_LINEAR, GrImage::EF_I8, 256, 1, data );
00369         AddAndInsertTexture( new GrTexture( GR_SYSTEX_LINEAR, linear, GrTexture::EF_I8, GrTexture::kNoMipMap | GrTexture::kNoCompress ) );
00370         delete[] data;
00371 
00373         data = new char[ 256 ];
00374         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 256; ++i )
00375                 data[ i ] = ( ( 255-i ) * ( 255-i ) ) >> 8;
00376         GrImage* quadratic = new GrImage( GR_SYSTEX_QUADRATIC, GrImage::EF_I8, 256, 1, data );
00377         AddAndInsertTexture( new GrTexture( GR_SYSTEX_QUADRATIC, quadratic, GrTexture::EF_I8, GrTexture::kNoMipMap | GrTexture::kNoCompress ) );
00378         delete[] data;
00379 
00382         GrImage* blackImages[ 6 ] = { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
00383         GrImage* whiteImages[ 6 ] = { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
00384         GrImage* errorImages[ 6 ] = { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
00385         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 6; ++i )
00386                 blackImages[ i ] = new GrImage( GR_SYSTEXCUBE_BLACK, 0x00000000 );
00387 
00388         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 6; ++i )
00389                 whiteImages[ i ] = new GrImage( GR_SYSTEXCUBE_WHITE, 0xFFFFFFFF );
00390 
00391         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 6; ++i )
00392                 errorImages[ i ] = new GrImage( GR_SYSTEXCUBE_ERROR, 0xFFFF0000 );
00393 
00394         AddAndInsertTexture( new GrTextureCube( GR_SYSTEXCUBE_BLACK, blackImages, GrTexture::EF_RGBA32, 
00395                 GrTexture::kNoMipMap | GrTexture::kNoCompress ) );
00396         AddAndInsertTexture( new GrTextureCube( GR_SYSTEXCUBE_WHITE, whiteImages, GrTexture::EF_RGBA32,
00397                 GrTexture::kNoMipMap | GrTexture::kNoCompress ) );
00398         AddAndInsertTexture( new GrTextureCube( GR_SYSTEXCUBE_ERROR, errorImages, GrTexture::EF_RGBA32,
00399                 GrTexture::kNoMipMap | GrTexture::kNoCompress ) );
00400 
00402         const unsigned int kNormalizeCubeSize = 512;
00403         void* ptrs[ 6 ] = { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
00404         GrImage* normalImages[ 6 ] = { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
00405 
00407         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 6; ++i )
00408                 ptrs[ i ] = new char[ kNormalizeCubeSize * kNormalizeCubeSize * 3 ];
00409 
00410         GenNormalizationCube( ptrs[ 0 ], ptrs[ 1 ], ptrs[ 2 ], ptrs[ 3 ], ptrs[ 4 ], ptrs[ 5 ], kNormalizeCubeSize );
00411 
00413         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 6; ++i )
00414         {
00415                 normalImages[ i ] = new GrImage( GR_SYSTEXCUBE_NORMALIZE, GrImage::EF_BGR24, kNormalizeCubeSize, kNormalizeCubeSize, ptrs[ i ] );
00416                 delete[] ptrs[ i ];
00417         }
00418 
00420         AddAndInsertTexture( new GrTextureCube( GR_SYSTEXCUBE_NORMALIZE, normalImages, GrTexture::EF_RGB24, GrTexture::kNoMipMap | GrTexture::kNoCompress ) );
00421 
00423         const unsigned int kJitterVolSize = 32;
00424         const unsigned int kJitterSampleCount = 64;
00425 
00427         unsigned int jitterVolDepth = kJitterSampleCount/2;
00428         unsigned char* ptr = new unsigned char[ kJitterVolSize*kJitterVolSize*jitterVolDepth*4 ];
00429         GenJitterVolume( ptr, kJitterVolSize, kJitterSampleCount );
00430 
00432         AddAndInsertTexture( new GrTexture3D( GR_SYSTEX3D_JITTER, GrTextureBase::EF_RGBA32, kJitterVolSize, kJitterVolSize,
00433                 jitterVolDepth, ptr ) );
00434         delete[] ptr;
00435 
00437         const unsigned int kSpotDim = 256;
00438         ptr = new unsigned char[ kSpotDim*kSpotDim ];
00439         GenSpotFalloffConst( ptr, kSpotDim );
00440         GrImage* falloffConst = new GrImage( GR_SYSTEX_SPOT_CONSTANT, GrImage::EF_I8, kSpotDim, kSpotDim, ptr );
00441         delete[] ptr;
00442 
00443         ptr = new unsigned char[ kSpotDim*kSpotDim ];
00444         GenSpotFalloffLin( ptr, kSpotDim );
00445         GrImage* falloffLin = new GrImage( GR_SYSTEX_SPOT_LINEAR, GrImage::EF_I8, kSpotDim, kSpotDim, ptr );
00446         delete[] ptr;
00447 
00448         ptr = new unsigned char[ kSpotDim*kSpotDim ];

00450         GrImage* falloffSqr = new GrImage( GR_SYSTEX_SPOT_QUADRATIC, GrImage::EF_I8, kSpotDim, kSpotDim, ptr );
00451         delete[] ptr;
00452 
00453         AddAndInsertTexture( new GrTexture( GR_SYSTEX_SPOT_CONSTANT, falloffConst, GrTextureBase::EF_I8, GrTexture::kNoMipMap ) );

00455         AddAndInsertTexture( new GrTexture( GR_SYSTEX_SPOT_QUADRATIC, falloffSqr, GrTextureBase::EF_I8, GrTexture::kNoMipMap ) );
00456 
00458         static const char* stippleNames[4] = {
00459                 GR_SYSTEX_STIPPLE0,
00460                 GR_SYSTEX_STIPPLE1,
00461                 GR_SYSTEX_STIPPLE2,
00462                 GR_SYSTEX_STIPPLE3,
00463         };
00464         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 4; ++i )
00465         {
00466                 static const unsigned int kStippleDim = 2;
00467                 ptr = new unsigned char[ kStippleDim * kStippleDim ];

00470                 GrImage* stipple = new GrImage( stippleNames[ i ], GrImage::EF_I8, kStippleDim, kStippleDim, ptr );
00471                 AddAndInsertTexture( new GrTexture( stippleNames[ i ], stipple, GrTextureBase::EF_I8, GrTexture::kNoMipMap | GrTexture::kNoCompress ) );
00472                 delete[] ptr;
00473         }
00474 
00476         float* cubeDataX[ 6 ];
00477         float* cubeDataY[ 6 ];
00478         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 6; ++i )
00479         {
00480                 cubeDataX[ i ] = new float[ 4 ];

00484         GenFaceImagesY( cubeDataY[ 0 ], cubeDataY[ 1 ], cubeDataY[ 2 ], cubeDataY[ 3 ], cubeDataY[ 4 ], cubeDataY[ 5 ] );

00490         {

00505 void
00506 GrTextureMgr::InsertTexture( URef< GrTextureBase > texture )
00507 {
00508         B_ASSERT( texture != 0 );
00509         _textures.insert( std::pair< UPath, URef< GrTextureBase > >( texture->GetName(), texture ) );

00512 //----------------------------------------------------------
00513 void
00514 GrTextureMgr::AddAndInsertTexture( URef< GrTextureBase > texture )

00516         B_ASSERT( texture != 0 );
00517         _textureVec.push_back( texture );

00521 //----------------------------------------------------------
00522 void
00523 GenNormalizationCube( void* px, void* nx, void* py, void* ny, void* pz, void* nz, unsigned int size )
00524 {
00526         float halfSize = float( size >> 1 );
00527         float offset = 0.5f;
00528         MVec3 tempVec;
00529         unsigned char* bytePtr;
00530 
00532         bytePtr = ( unsigned char* )px;
00533         for ( unsigned int j=0; j<size; ++j )
00534         {
00535                 for ( unsigned int i=0; i<size; ++i )
00536                 {
00537                         tempVec.SetX( halfSize );
00538                         tempVec.SetY( -( j+offset-halfSize ) );
00539                         tempVec.SetZ( -( i+offset-halfSize ) );
00540                         tempVec.Normalize();
00541 
00542                         SByteVec3 byteVec( tempVec );
00543                         bytePtr[ 0 ] = byteVec.z;
00544                         bytePtr[ 1 ] = byteVec.y;
00545                         bytePtr[ 2 ] = byteVec.x;
00546 
00547                         bytePtr+=3;
00548                 }
00549         }
00550 
00552         bytePtr = ( unsigned char* )nx;
00553         for( unsigned int j=0; j<size; ++j )
00554         {
00555                 for( unsigned int i=0; i<size; ++i )
00556                 {
00557                         tempVec.SetX( -halfSize );
00558                         tempVec.SetY( -( j+offset-halfSize ) );
00559                         tempVec.SetZ( ( i+offset-halfSize ) );
00560                         tempVec.Normalize();
00561 
00562                         SByteVec3 byteVec( tempVec );
00563                         bytePtr[ 0 ] = byteVec.z;
00564                         bytePtr[ 1 ] = byteVec.y;
00565                         bytePtr[ 2 ] = byteVec.x;
00566 
00567                         bytePtr+=3;
00568                 }
00569         }
00570 
00572         bytePtr = ( unsigned char* )py;
00573         for( unsigned int j=0; j<size; ++j )
00574         {
00575                 for( unsigned int i=0; i<size; ++i )
00576                 {
00577                         tempVec.SetX( i+offset-halfSize );
00578                         tempVec.SetY( halfSize );
00579                         tempVec.SetZ( ( j+offset-halfSize ) );
00580                         tempVec.Normalize();
00581 
00582                         SByteVec3 byteVec( tempVec );
00583                         bytePtr[ 0 ] = byteVec.z;
00584                         bytePtr[ 1 ] = byteVec.y;
00585                         bytePtr[ 2 ] = byteVec.x;
00586 
00587                         bytePtr+=3;
00588                 }
00589         }
00590 
00592         bytePtr = ( unsigned char* )ny;
00593         for( unsigned int j=0; j<size; ++j )
00594         {
00595                 for( unsigned int i=0; i<size; ++i )
00596                 {
00597                         tempVec.SetX( i+offset-halfSize );
00598                         tempVec.SetY( -halfSize );
00599                         tempVec.SetZ( -( j+offset-halfSize ) );
00600                         tempVec.Normalize();
00601 
00602                         SByteVec3 byteVec( tempVec );
00603                         bytePtr[ 0 ] = byteVec.z;
00604                         bytePtr[ 1 ] = byteVec.y;
00605                         bytePtr[ 2 ] = byteVec.x;
00606 
00607                         bytePtr+=3;
00608                 }
00609         }
00610 
00612         bytePtr = ( unsigned char* )pz;
00613         for( unsigned int j=0; j<size; ++j )
00614         {
00615                 for( unsigned int i=0; i<size; ++i )
00616                 {
00617                         tempVec.SetX( i+offset-halfSize );
00618                         tempVec.SetY( -( j+offset-halfSize ) );
00619                         tempVec.SetZ( halfSize );
00620                         tempVec.Normalize();
00621 
00622                         SByteVec3 byteVec( tempVec );
00623                         bytePtr[ 0 ] = byteVec.z;
00624                         bytePtr[ 1 ] = byteVec.y;
00625                         bytePtr[ 2 ] = byteVec.x;
00626 
00627                         bytePtr+=3;
00628                 }
00629         }
00630 
00632         bytePtr = ( unsigned char* )nz;
00633         for( unsigned int j=0; j<size; ++j )
00634         {
00635                 for( unsigned int i=0; i<size; ++i )
00636                 {
00637                         tempVec.SetX( -( i+offset-halfSize ) );
00638                         tempVec.SetY( -( j+offset-halfSize ) );
00639                         tempVec.SetZ( -halfSize );
00640                         tempVec.Normalize();
00641 
00642                         SByteVec3 byteVec( tempVec );
00643                         bytePtr[ 0 ] = byteVec.z;
00644                         bytePtr[ 1 ] = byteVec.y;
00645                         bytePtr[ 2 ] = byteVec.x;
00646 
00647                         bytePtr+=3;
00648                 }
00649         }
00650 }

00652 //----------------------------------------------------------
00653 void
00654 GenJitterVolume( void* ptr, unsigned int size, unsigned int jitterSamples )
00655 {
00657         unsigned char* bytePtr = ( unsigned char* )ptr;
00658         float fJitterSamples = (float)jitterSamples;
00659 
00661         URand randGen( ( int )GetTickCount() );
00662 
00664         for ( int i = 0; i < ( int )size; ++i )
00665         {
00666                 for ( int j = 0; j < ( int )size; ++j )
00667                 {
00668                         for ( int k = 0; k < ( int )jitterSamples; ++k, bytePtr += 2 )
00669                         {
00671                                 float r = Sqrt( randGen.RandFloat() );
00672                                 float theta = randGen.RandFloat() * TWO_PI;
00673                                 float x = r * Cos( theta );
00674                                 float y = r * Sin( theta );
00675 
00677                                 bytePtr[ 0 ] = ( unsigned char )( 255.0f * ( 0.5f * x + 0.5f ) );
00678                                 bytePtr[ 1 ] = ( unsigned char )( 255.0f * ( 0.5f * y + 0.5f ) );
00679                         }
00680                 }
00681         }
00682 }
00683 
00684 //----------------------------------------------------------
00685 #define _SHARP_ATTEN
00686 void
00687 GenAttenImage( void* ptr, unsigned int dim )
00688 {
00689         const float kS = 1.0f;
00690         const float kE = 2.71828183f;
00691 
00692         float edge = 1.0f - ( 1.0f / float( dim ) );
00693 
00695         unsigned char* dst = ( unsigned char* )ptr;
00696         for ( unsigned int y = 0; y < dim; ++y )
00697         {
00698                 for ( unsigned int x = 0; x < dim; ++x, ++dst )
00699                 {
00700                         float nx = float( x ) / float( dim );
00701                         float ny = float( y ) / float( dim );
00702 
00703                         float d = Sqrt( nx*nx + ny*ny );
00704 #ifdef _SHARP_ATTEN
00705                         float c = Min( d, 1.0f );
00706                         c = ( c < edge ) ? 1.0f : 0.0f;
00707 #else
00708 //                      float c = Clamp( edge - d, 0.0f, 1.0f );
00709                         float c = 1.0f - Clamp( d, 0.0f, 1.0f );
00710                         c = Pow( c, 3.0f );
00711 #endif
00712                         *dst = ( unsigned char )( c*255.0f );
00713 
00714 /*
00716                         float nx = 2.5f * float( x ) / float( dim );
00717                         float ny = 2.5f * float( y ) / float( dim );
00718 
00719                         float exp = -0.5f * ( ( nx*nx+ny*ny ) / (kS*kS) );
00720                         float c = Clamp( Pow( kE, exp ), 0.0f, 1.0f ) / TWO_PI;
00721                         *dst = ( unsigned char )( c*255.0f );
00722 */
00723                 }
00724         }
00725 }
00726 
00727 //----------------------------------------------------------
00728 void
00729 GenZLookup( void* ptr, unsigned int len, float nearZ, float max )
00730 {
00731         B_ASSERT( max > 0.0f && max < 1.0f );
00732 
00733         float* dst = ( float* )ptr;
00734         float fLen = ( float )len;
00735         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < len; ++i, ++dst )
00736         {
00737                 float s = Min( ( float( i ) / fLen ), max );
00738                 *dst = -nearZ / ( s - 1.0f );
00739         }
00740 }
00741 
00742 //----------------------------------------------------------
00743 void GenSpotFalloffConst( void* ptr, unsigned int dim )
00744 {
00745         B_ASSERT( IsPow2( dim ) && dim > 2 );
00746 
00748         float fInvDim = 1.0f / float( dim );
00749         float shift = 0.5f * fInvDim;
00750         float fHalfSub1 = float( ( dim >> 1 ) - 1 );
00751         unsigned char* dst = ( unsigned char* )ptr;
00752 
00754         for ( unsigned int y = 0; y < dim; ++y )
00755         {
00756                 float vecY = float( fHalfSub1 - float( y ) ) / fHalfSub1;
00757                 for ( unsigned int x = 0; x < dim; ++x, ++dst )
00758                 {
00759                         float vecX = ( fHalfSub1 - float( x ) ) / fHalfSub1;
00760                         float len = Sqrt( vecX*vecX + vecY*vecY );
00761                         *dst = ( unsigned char )( len < 1.0f ? 255 : 0 );
00762                 }
00763         }
00764 }
00765 
00766 //----------------------------------------------------------
00767 void GenSpotFalloffLin( void* ptr, unsigned int dim )
00768 {
00769         B_ASSERT( IsPow2( dim ) && dim > 2 );
00770 
00772         float fInvDim = 1.0f / float( dim );
00773         float shift = 0.5f * fInvDim;
00774         float fHalfSub1 = float( ( dim >> 1 ) - 1 );
00775         unsigned char* dst = ( unsigned char* )ptr;
00776 
00778         for ( unsigned int y = 0; y < dim; ++y )
00779         {
00780                 float vecY = float( fHalfSub1 - float( y ) ) / fHalfSub1;
00781                 for ( unsigned int x = 0; x < dim; ++x, ++dst )
00782                 {
00783                         float vecX = ( fHalfSub1 - float( x ) ) / fHalfSub1;
00784                         float vecZ = 1.0f-Sqrt( vecX*vecX + vecY*vecY );
00785                         B_ASSERT( vecZ <= 1.0f );
00786                         vecZ = Max( vecZ, 0.0f );
00787                         *dst = ( unsigned char )( 255.0f * vecZ );
00788                 }
00789         }
00790 }
00791 
00792 //----------------------------------------------------------
00793 void GenSpotFalloffSqr( void* ptr, unsigned int dim )
00794 {
00795         B_ASSERT( IsPow2( dim ) && dim > 2 );
00796 
00798         float fInvDim = 1.0f / float( dim );
00799         float shift = 0.5f * fInvDim;
00800         float fHalfSub1 = float( ( dim >> 1 ) - 1 );
00801         unsigned char* dst = ( unsigned char* )ptr;
00802 
00804         for ( unsigned int y = 0; y < dim; ++y )
00805         {
00806                 float vecY = float( fHalfSub1 - float( y ) ) / fHalfSub1;
00807                 for ( unsigned int x = 0; x < dim; ++x, ++dst )
00808                 {
00809                         float vecX = ( fHalfSub1 - float( x ) ) / fHalfSub1;
00810                         float vecZ = 1.0f-Sqrt( vecX*vecX + vecY*vecY );
00811                         B_ASSERT( vecZ <= 1.0f );
00812                         vecZ = Max( vecZ, 0.0f );
00813                         *dst = ( unsigned char )( 255.0f * vecZ * vecZ );
00814                 }
00815         }
00816 }

00821         px[ 0 ] =  0.0f;

00827         nx[ 1 ] =  0.0f;

00829         nx[ 3 ] =  0.0f;
00830 
00831         py[ 0 ] =  1.0f;        
00832         py[ 1 ] =  0.0f;        
00833         py[ 2 ] =  0.0f;        
00834         py[ 3 ] =  0.0f;
00835 
00836         ny[ 0 ] =  1.0f;        
00837         ny[ 1 ] =  0.0f;        
00838         ny[ 2 ] =  0.0f;        
00839         ny[ 3 ] =  0.0f;

00843         pz[ 2 ] =  0.0f;        
00844         pz[ 3 ] =  0.0f;
